name: Fisher's Road
overview: Fisher's Road is a bass fishing game that features different game modes: - Practice: Practice fishing. - Free mode: Choose a fishing spot and start fishing - Basser's life: A sort of a story mode (mixing simulation and fishing) in which the player can pick fishing places, rest times and modify the stats of his fisherman doing different things during each week. The game features also a complete information of the game lakes, rods, lures, fishing techniques, etc.
